features: Leaves behind a refreshing Eucalyptus Mint fragrance as you clean
For use in all steam mops, all brands
body.description: Discovering a green way to clean Clean and sanitize when used as directed in one easy step. Steam is an all-natural cleaner that can sanitize when used as directed, clear sticky spots and eliminate dirt–all without the use of harsh chemicals. Steaming is safe on virtually all sealed hard surfaces including: ceramic, vinyl, laminate, granite, marble and sealed hard wood. Drying takes just seconds, so it’s easy to clean anytime, anywhere. From showers and windows to counters and floors, there isn’t a surface that can’t be cleaned with steam. For tackling tough grime on above floor surfaces, we recommend a hand-held steam cleaner or the BISSELL Lift-Off Steam Mop for the job.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Refresh your room with a citrus scented demineralized water for use in your steam mops. Leaves behind a refreshing Citrus fragrance as you clean. For use in steam mops. No dulling residue left behind See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This smells amazing! Seems to work great on my tile floors. I just wish the scent was a little stronger so it lingered longer. Overall will definitely order again. I have pets and they didn't seem to mind it either. Smells amazingly fresh and clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cleans great. Smells great. You do go through it pretty fast though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this product
reviews.reviewText: I deep clean my house every single week which includes dusting, wiping down all surfaces, vacuuming and steam mopping. This product is so good. The light scent is amazing and smells like a relaxing spa. It is such a fresh, clean feeling. It also does a great job on my wood and tile floors. It makes it feel so clean and doesn't leave any sort of film. I have repurchased this product a ton of times and will continue to for as long as it is available. This is a staple in my cleaning routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice Smell.but not sure it helps clean any better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey, but works very well!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this product to use in our BISSELL steamer. It has a nice, fresh clean scent. and it appears to really clear our floor tile very well, even the grout looks better. It's not cheap but I think this is an instance of you get what you pay for. So far, my wife has steamed our floors four times and we probably have enough to steam them twice more. Very good complement to the BISSELL steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Save your money and use distilled water
reviews.reviewText: Does nothing to enhance cleaning power and very little scent. I would recommend using regular distilled water and, if you want fragrance, one of the discs that you can use to add fragrance is much less expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product seems to work great, it had a nice clean smell that is not over powerful. It leaves my hard wood floors looking clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
